DOC.brief_summary: Investigation of pharmacokinetic effects of combining fentanyl and adrenalin in the epidural solution given to women in childbirth
DOC.brief_title: Safety of Epidural Fentanyl and Adrenalin During Childbirth
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy women with indication for labor epidural at the Labor Clinic, Rikshospitalet University Hospital, may be included. A randomized, placebocontrolled, double blind,comparison of epidural with and without adrenalin. Outcome: Length of birth, quality of pain relief, total amount of epidural solution injected, and plasma concentration of fentanyl.
DOC.criteria: Pregnant women at term in active labor age below 18 years BMI > 40 drug hypersensitivity
